SELECT id,name FROM member WHERE name LIKE ‚Äò%ÍπÄ‚Äô

SELECT id,p_name FROM member WHERE p_name LIKE ‚Äò%ÌîÑÎ¶∞ÌÑ∞%‚Äô

SELECT id,name FROM member WHERE name LIKE ‚ÄòÍπÄ?‚Äô

  • ‚ÄòÍπÄ‚Äô + Ïô∏ÏûêÏù∏ ÏÇ¨ÎûåÏùÑ Î™®Îëê Ï°∞Ìöå

Code

SELECT A.ANIMAL_ID, A.ANIMAL_TYPE, A.NAME
    FROM ANIMAL_INS A INNER JOIN ANIMAL_OUTS B ON A.ANIMAL_ID = B.ANIMAL_ID
    WHERE A.SEX_UPON_INTAKE LIKE "Intact%"
        AND (B.SEX_UPON_OUTCOME LIKE "Spayed%" OR B.SEX_UPON_OUTCOME LIKE "Neutered%")
    ORDER BY A.ANIMAL_ID ASC;
#ÌîÑÎ°úÍ∑∏ÎûòÎ®∏Ïä§ #sql #join #Í≤ÄÏÉâ
